rooms.description: Central open-plan space with a modern minimalist design, featuring large windows for natural light. Vastu compliant with south facing entrance.
Adjacent to the living room, ideal for family gatherings and meal times, maintains an open layout.
Private suite with attached ensuite bathroom. Vastu suggests placing master bedroom in the south-east corner to ensure good health.
Spare bedroom for children or guests, ideally placed adjacent to the living area for easy access.
Additional bedroom with ample storage and natural lighting, positioned on the east side of the floor plan.
Efficient minimalist kitchen space located in the north-east corner to harness positive energy. Utilizes cost-effective modern fixtures and materials.
Open courtyard for relaxation and additional natural light; can serve as a transitional space between indoor areas.

openings.description: Grand yet simple door design following Vastu principles, with minimalistic detailing.
Large windows across the living room and bedrooms to allow maximum natural light while maintaining privacy.
Service entrance for deliveries and utilities, in accordance with local norms.

levels.notes: The design integrates minimalist aesthetics while adhering to Vastu principles such as appropriate room placement and orientation. All spaces are designed within the constraints of a 40x60 feet plot ensuring cost-effectiveness without compromising on quality.
